title: Mechanical
content: Wheel Alignment Adjustments
Must have full tank of fuel, no luggage and no passengers.Front SuspensionRear SuspensionVehicle Ride Height

Veh is to be at curb height to check for weak or broken springs, and to check and/or set veh front and rear alignment specs. Jack front and ballast rear of veh to obtain correct veh design height using vehicle design height checking fixture.+5/16 +/- 1/4 in
Higher than height checking fixture without block+5/16 +/- 3/8 in
